		Question: what did dr. seuss do

answer: Dr. Seuss was an author, publisher, and broadcaster.
kaping_triples: (Dr. Seuss, publication date, June 1956), (On Beyond Zebra!, publisher, Dr. Seuss Enterprises), (The Cat in the Hat, author, Dr. Seuss), (The Cat's Quizzer, publisher, Dr. Seuss Enterprises), (Theodor Seuss Geisel, date of birth, March 2, 1904), (And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street, publisher, Dr. Seuss Enterprises), (The Wubbulous World of Dr. Seuss, original broadcaster, Nickelodeon), (Theodor Seuss Geisel, date of death, September 24, 1991), (Scrambled Eggs Super!, publisher, Dr. Seuss Enterprises), (McElligot's Pool, publisher, Dr. Seuss Enterprises)
